column2: Psssst! I was hoping I'd see you. Wanna go scope around in the System?
Definitely.
Ok. So you just need to launch the System app now and we're golden.
Click on the System app icon on the desktop.

Awesome. This place is LIT. We have to be beyond quiet. We don't want Saniel knowing we're here. 

He seems to be able to hear everything! Sometimes I think he even hears what I'm thinking! Ssshhhhh.
Ok, remember the Flip button? Go ahead and press it.
See the button on the left? Press it to hack the System.
The other day I found this key and I think it fits here! I'm going to give it to you.
Now click on that to unlock it. I wonder what's behind it?
Click anywhere to unlock it.
Rad! We can have so much fun playing around with the settings.
Try maxing out the cursor size to to make it huge!
Click the + next to "Size" until it's more than 200!

LOLLZZ. OMG. So epic! We have to stop laughing or San will hear us. He's like a bat! 

Uh-oh! Yep, too lateâ€“he's coming! Hi there, Dr. Rowe. We're just, er, studying!
I just told you this is no place for novices! Hhmmph.
All's not lost yet. There's still a fix for this. I'm enabling the Reset button. Press it and it brings back the original settings.
Press the button on the top right to reset the cursor size.
Good job restoring the settings! Glad you know about the Reset button now.
I see you already fixed it. Very sensible. I'm also enabling the Reset button, which returns things to the original settings.
Keep it handy for when you need to clean up messes like this one!
No prob! We can try again later.
